properties.displayName: New Network Trace Capture Started Via Netsh.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "trace" and ProcessCommandLine contains "start") and (FolderPath endswith "\\netsh.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "netsh.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of netsh with the "trace" flag in order to start a network capture
